title: Chambers of Xeric/Food

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Chambers of Xeric contain fish and bats that are sources of food used exclusively within this raid.

content:
The Chambers of Xeric contain fish and bats that are sources of food used exclusively within this raid.

Resource rooms have a 50% chance of spawning bats and a 50% chance of having fishing spots.

Food from the Chambers of Xeric are not affected by the cooking gauntlets.[1]

Fish[edit | edit source]

To catch fish, a fishing rod is required, with cave worms as bait. Scavenger beasts drop both of these items. In resource rooms with fishing spots, there are three fishing spots. One of these three spots contains a cave snake, which will damage the player (or take their fish). If a snake appears in the fishing spot, stop fishing and click elsewhere to avoid taking damage. While the spots are static, the spots containing plain fish and the cave snake change occasionally.

Raw fish Fishing Cooked fish Cooking Heals

Raw mycil fish (4) 60 32 Mycil fish (4) 60 22 17
Raw roqed fish (5) 75 35 Roqed fish (5) 75 25 20
Raw kyren fish (6) 90 38 Kyren fish (6) 90 28 23

Bats[edit | edit source]

To catch bats, a butterfly net is required. Scavenger beasts drop butterfly nets.

rawContent:
The [[Chambers of Xeric]] contain '''fish''' and '''bats''' that are sources of [[food]] used exclusively within this [[raid]].

Resource rooms have a 50% chance of spawning bats and a 50% chance of having fishing spots.

Food from the Chambers of Xeric are '''not''' affected by the [[cooking gauntlets]].{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1214495925663682565|date=7 January 2020|archiveurl=https://archive.ph/0Ey5h|archivedate=7 January 2020|quote=No, we never installed gauntlet perks for [raids food].}}

==Fish==
To catch fish, a [[fishing rod]] is required, with [[cave worms]] as bait. [[Scavenger beast]]s drop both of these items. In resource rooms with fishing spots, there are three fishing spots. One of these three spots contains a [[cave snake]], which will damage the player (or take their fish). If a snake appears in the fishing spot, stop fishing and click elsewhere to avoid taking damage. While the spots are static, the spots containing plain fish and the cave snake change occasionally.
